contentrichtext.text: {{Redirect|Société Anonyme|the art organisation|Société Anonyme (art)}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Companies law}} '''S.A.''' designates a particular type of [[corporation]] in various countries, mostly those employing [[civil law (legal system)|civil law]]. Depending on language, the abbreviation stands for various phrases meaning ''anonymous society'', ''anonymous company'', ''anonymous partnership'', or ''share company''. The concept is roughly equivalent to that of the [[public limited company]] in the UK and some other countries. It can be differentiated from [[partnership]]s and [[private limited company|private limited companies]]. S.A. can be an abbreviation of: * {{Lang|es|''Sociedad Anónima''}} or {{Lang|es|''Sociedad por Acciones''}} in [[Spanish language|Spanish]]; variations include "S.A. de C.V." ({{Lang|es|''Sociedad Anónima de Capital Variable''}}) and "S.A.B. de C.V." ({{Lang|es|''Sociedad Anónima Bursátil de Capital Variable''}}) for [[Public company|publicly traded companies]] in [[Mexico]] **Mexico also has the form ''S. de R. L. de C.V.'', or in full ''Sociedad de Responsabilidad Limitada de Capital Variable'' * {{Lang|ca|''Societat Anònima''}} in [[Catalan language|Catalan]] * {{Lang|gl|''Sociedade Anónima''}} in [[Galician language|Galician]] and [[European Portuguese]] (used in [[Portugal]], [[Angola]], [[Timor Leste]], [[Macao]], [[Mozambique]] and various other [[Lusophony|Portuguese-speaking countries]]) * {{Lang|pt-br|''Sociedade Anônima''}} in [[Brazilian Portuguese]] (used in [[Brazil]]) * {{Lang|ast|''Sociedá Anónima''}} in [[Asturian language|Asturian]] and [[Leonese language|Leonese]] * {{Lang|it|''Società Anonima''}} in [[Italian language|Italian]] (since 1942 {{Lang|it|''Società per Azioni''}} abbreviated "S.p.A.") * {{Lang|fr|''Société Anonyme''}} in [[French language|French]] (as commonly used in [[La Francophonie|French-speaking countries]], such as [[France]], [[Luxembourg]], [[Switzerland]], and [[Monaco]]; and in partially Francophone countries like [[Belgium]], [[Lebanon]], [[Tunisia]], [[Morocco]], [[Mauritania]], and various other African countries) * {{Lang|pl|''Spółka Akcyjna''}} in [[Polish language|Polish]] * {{Lang|ro|''Societate pe Acţiuni''}} in [[Romanian language|Romanian]] It is equivalent in both literal meaning and practical function to: * {{Lang|tr|''Anonim Şirket (A.Ş.)''}} in [[Turkish language|Turkish]] * {{Lang|el|''Ανώνυμη Εταιρεία}}'' (A.E., {{Lang|el-Latn|''Anonymi Etaireia''}}) in [[Greek language|Greek]] * {{Lang|nl|''[[Naamloze Vennootschap]] (N.V.)''}} in [[Dutch language|Dutch]] * {{Lang|id|''Perseroan Terbatas Terbuka (P.T. Tbk.)''}} in [[Indonesia]] * {{Lang|ms|''Sendirian Berhad (Sdn. Bhd.)''}} in [[Malaysia]] It is equivalent in practical function to: * ''[[Aktiengesellschaft]]'' (AG) in [[German language|German]] * ''[[Osakeyhtiö]]'' (Oy) in [[Finnish language|Finnish]] * ''[[Aktiebolag]]'' (AB) in [[Swedish language|Swedish]] * ''[[Részvénytársaság]]'' (Rt) in [[Hungarian language|Hungarian]] * {{Lang|lt|''Akcinė Bendrovė''}} (AB) in [[Lithuanian language|Lithuanian]] * ''[[Aktieselskab]]'' (A/S) in [[Danish language|Danish]] * ''[[Aksjeselskap]]'' (AS) in [[Norwegian language|Norwegian]] * {{Lang|sk|''Akciová spoločnosť''}} (a.s.) in [[Slovak language|Slovak]] * {{Lang|cz|''Akciová společnost''}} (a.s.) in [[Czech language|Czech]] * {{Lang|ru|Акционерное общество}} (АО, {{lang|ru-Latn|''Aktsionernoye obshchestvo''}}) in [[Russian language|Russian]] * {{Lang|ua|Акціонерне товариство}} (АТ, {{lang|ua-Latn|''Aktsionerne tovarystvo''}}) in [[Ukrainian language|Ukrainian]] * {{Lang|bg|Акционерно дружество}} (АД, {{lang|bg-Latn|''Aktsionerno druzhestvo''}}) in [[Bulgarian language|Bulgarian]] * {{Lang|sq|''Shoqëri Aksionare (Sh.a.)''}} in [[Albanian language|Albanian]] * {{Lang|sl|''Delniška družba''}} (d.d.) in [[Slovenian language|Slovene]] * {{Lang|hr|''Dioničko društvo''}} (d.d.) in [[Croatian language|Croatian]] and [[Bosnian language|Bosnian]] * {{Lang|sr|''Deoničarsko društvo (Деоничарско друштво) or Akcionarsko društvo (Акционарско друштво)''}} (''d.d.'' or ''a.d.'') in [[Serbian language|Serbian]] * {{Lang|en|''Public limited company''}} (plc) in [[English language|English]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:S.A. (Corporation)}} [[Category:Types of business entity]] [[de:Société Anonyme (Frankreich)]]
